com.rexsl.trap
Class SmtpBulkNotifier

java.lang.Object
  com.rexsl.trap.SmtpBulkNotifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Notifier, Closeable
public final class SmtpBulkNotifier
extends Object

Notifier by SMTP, with pre-packaging into bulks.

Configuration of this notifier is similar to SmtpNotifier, but requires one more parameter: interval. This parameter should contain an integer number of minutes we should wait before actual delivery of emails. This option may be critically important if you expect high volume of exceptions and don't want to receive many individual emails.

Since:
0.3.6
